[00:00.00]The Spectre - Alan Walker (艾兰·沃克)
[00:05.17]Written by：Anders Froen/Alan Walker/Jesper Borgen/Lars Kristian Rosness/Marcus Arnbekk/Gunnar Greve/Tommy LaVerdi
[00:10.34]Hello hello
[00:11.60]
[00:12.19]Can you hear me as I scream your name
[00:17.78]Hello hello
[00:19.05]
[00:19.66]Do you need me before I fade away
[00:25.35]Is this a place that I call home
[00:28.79]
[00:29.99]To find what I've become
[00:32.24]
[00:33.00]Walk along the path unknown
[00:36.31]
[00:37.25]We live we love we lie
[00:39.98]
[00:40.53]Deep in the dark I don't need the light
[00:43.87]
[00:44.50]There is a ghost inside me
[00:47.39]
[00:48.03]It all belongs to the other side
[00:51.55]
[00:52.25]We live we love we lie
[00:55.19]
[00:59.92]We live we love we lie
